description: Number of binary rooted trees of height n requiring 3 registers.
comments: The eighteen listed terms a(7)...a(24) satisfy a(n) = 14a(n-1) - 78a(n-2) + 220a(n-3) - 330a(n-4) + 252a(n-5) - 84a(n-6) + 8a(n-7) for n>7 (taking a(1), a(2), ..., a(6) = 0). - _John W. Layman_, Oct 14 1999
references: Flajolet, P.; Raoult, J.-C.; Vuillemin, J.; The number of registers required for evaluating arithmetic expressions. Theoret. Comput. Sci. 9 (1979), no. 1, 99-125.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Simon Plouffe, Approximations de séries génératrices et quelques conjectures, Dissertation, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
Simon Plouffe, 1031 Generating Functions and Conjectures, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
